channel.title: Renewable energy on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Renewable energy on FinanClub

item.title: SWN
item.description: score:48 Chances: Southwestern Energy is engaged in the exploration, development, and production of natural gas, oil, and NGLs, which are key components of the energy industry. The renewable energy industry is a trillion-dollar industry and the optimism around renewable energy presents opportunities for Southwestern Energy.

item.title: SEDG
item.description: score:-56 Chances: The Fed meeting spurred confidence in lower inflation and lower interest rates in 2024. Analysts are expecting solar stocks to rebound on increased solar panel installations in 2024. Risks: Solar industry growth in Europe has decelerated due to surplus inventories and reduced demand in crucial markets.
